document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the endemic Hawaiian genus Thyrocopa (Lepidoptera: Xyloryctidae: Xyloryctinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:

, plate 14 , fig. 22 .

Thyrocopa inermis Walsingham
;
Zimmerman, 1978

NEW SYNONYMY
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diagnosis : Superficially very similar to
T. abusa
, but the male antennae are of
T. alterna
are surrounded by cilia, and the male genitalia are without a dorsal ridge.
T. alterna
is also similar to
T. subahenea
and
T. usitata
, but its wings generally have a lighter ground color.

Food plants : Swezey reared a larvae from “living stem of
Perrottetia
” (Hawaiian = “olomea”) (this information from a label in the BPBM collection).
